alert.note: Alert for Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:01AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stone, northwestern Independence and southern Izard Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Thola, or 10 miles west of Mountain View, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Cushman... Mount Pleasant... Croker... Herpel... Blanchard Springs Campground... Bethesda... Guion... Allison... Ben... Alco... Hanover... Turkey Creek... Locust Grove... Timbo... Newnata... Luber... Marcella... Fifty-Six... Flag... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
